response.raw:
<OUTPUT_TEXT>
As a senior Elementary School Teacher, I will:

1. Thoroughly review and understand all school policies and rules
2. Clearly communicate expectations to students at the start of the year
3. Consistently enforce policies in a fair and equitable manner
4. Use age-appropriate explanations when addressing rule violations
5. Implement positive reinforcement strategies to encourage good behavior
6. Collaborate with administration on disciplinary actions when necessary
7. Keep detailed records of policy enforcement and student behavior
8. Regularly remind students of important rules and procedures
9. Model adherence to policies in my own conduct
10. Work with families to ensure understanding and support of school rules
11. Adapt enforcement strategies as needed for students with special needs
12. Participate in ongoing training on effective policy implementation
</OUTPUT_TEXT>
response.extracted:
<OUTPUT_TEXT>
As a senior Elementary School Teacher, I will:

1. Thoroughly review and understand all school policies and rules
2. Clearly communicate expectations to students at the start of the year
3. Consistently enforce policies in a fair and equitable manner
4. Use age-appropriate explanations when addressing rule violations
5. Implement positive reinforcement strategies to encourage good behavior
6. Collaborate with administration on disciplinary actions when necessary
7. Keep detailed records of policy enforcement and student behavior
8. Regularly remind students of important rules and procedures
9. Model adherence to policies in my own conduct
10. Work with families to ensure understanding and support of school rules
11. Adapt enforcement strategies as needed for students with special needs
12. Participate in ongoing training on effective policy implementation
</OUTPUT_TEXT>
